getAmortizationData

public static java.util.List<AmRow> getAmortizationData(java.util.Date startDate,
                                                        double loanAmount,
                                                        double interestRate,
                                                        double monthlyPayment)
Retrieve the amortization data as a standalone step

Parameters:
startDate - Starting loan payment date
loanAmount - Starting loan amount
interestRate - Annual interest rate as a pct (i.e. 4.75 %)
monthlyPayment - User's monthly payment
Returns:
Amortization data
